item.title: [khm] Ascendant Spirit
item.description:
Snow Creature — Spirit

{S}{S}: Ascendant Spirit becomes a Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 2/3.

{S}{S}{S}: If Ascendant Spirit is a Warrior, put a flying counter on it and it becomes a Spirit Warrior angel with base power and toughness 4/4.

{S}{S}{S}{S}: If Ascendant Spirit is an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it gains "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, draw a card."

item.title: [khm] Battle of Frost and Fire
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I — Battle of Frost and Fire deals 4 damage to each non-Giant creature and each planeswalker.

II — Scry 3.

III — Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater this turn, draw two cards, then discard a card.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zxgxEWiKyuA

III — Choose up to one target creature or planeswalker. Each creature you control with power 4 or greater deals damage equal to its power to that permanent.
